title: Matchsafe, ""J. Hynam's Royal Patent Congreves & Safety Fire Boxes"", ca. 1850
provenance: Collection of Carol B. Brener and Stephen W. Brener
creditline: Gift of Stephen W. Brener and Carol B. Brener
description: Rectangular, snuff box style container, featuring raised decoration of Queen Victoria and Prince Albert, their names inscribed above each respectively, royal coat-of-arms between them, inscribed above all "J.Hynam's Royal Patent Congreves," inscribed below "& Safety Fire Boxes, 5 & 7 Princes Sq. Wilson St., Finsbury London." Lid hinged on back, long side. Striker on same side.

exhibitions.title: Faster, Cheaper, Newer, More: The Revolutions of 1848

tombstone.epitaph:
Matchsafe, ""J. Hynam's Royal Patent Congreves & Safety Fire Boxes"", ca. 1850.
ca. 1850. Plated tin. Gift of Stephen W. Brener and Carol B. Brener. 1982-23-778.
